paragraphs.body: "She was in Miley Cyrus's "7 Things" music video." Any evidence to back this claim up?Avatarbob 15:57, 27 July 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: "She was in Miley Cyrus's "7 Things" music video." Any evidence to back this claim up?Avatarbob 15:57, 27 July 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Personally - I have no idea. I just changed '7 thing' to '7 Things', just because of the proper name of the song/video. Haven't read anything about who these girls in the video were... But probably the person who added the whole statement knows it. :-/ Best wishes, Tina T 16:40, 27 July 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Look, I know people don't like the fact that the actors are white, but can we look at this from the perspective of the wiki for a moment? We've covered the topic in a ${link_0}, as well as on a number of forums. I find it both unnecessary and inappropriate to mention this controversy on an actor's page. The pages of the actors themselves should only contain biographical information. We should remove this. Puragus Talk 22:37, 10 August 2009 (UTC)

links.body: controversy section on the movie page

paragraphs.text: Look, I know people don't like the fact that the actors are white, but can we look at this from the perspective of the wiki for a moment? We've covered the topic in a controversy section on the movie page, as well as on a number of forums. I find it both unnecessary and inappropriate to mention this controversy on an actor's page. The pages of the actors themselves should only contain biographical information. We should remove this. Puragus Talk 22:37, 10 August 2009 (UTC)
